mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag, l.created_at, COALESCE(rs.avg_score, 0) as avg_score, COALESCE(rs.review_count, 0) as review_count, COALESCE(es.student_count, 0) as student_count FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN ( SELECT lecture_num, ROUND(AVG(review_score), 1) as avg_score, COUNT(*) as review_count FROM review GROUP BY lecture_num ) rs ON l.lecture_num = rs.lecture_num LEFT JOIN ( SELECT lecture_num, COUNT(DISTINCT enrollment_id) as student_count FROM enrollment GROUP BY lecture_num ) es ON l.lecture_num = es.lecture_num WHERE l.user_num = #{user_num} ORDER BY l.lecture_num DESC
